Address.label: Address
Address.value: 925 WEST GEORGIA STREET,SUITE 1800, VANCOUVER, British Columbia, V6C 3L2, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: First Majestic is a publicly traded mining company focused on silver and gold production in Mexico and the United States. The Company presently owns and operates the San Dimas Silver/Gold Mine, the Santa Elena Silver/Gold Mine and the La Encantada Silver Mine.
